comments:
handles the model fitting for each machine. NOTE: this is primarily handled outside of DistributedModel because joblib cannot handle class methods.

Parameters ---------- self : DistributedModel class instance An instance of DistributedModel. pnum : scalar index of current partition. endog : array_like endogenous data for current partition. exog : array_like exogenous data for current partition. fit_kwds : dict-like Keywords needed for the model fitting. init_kwds_e : dict-like Additional init_kwds to add for each partition.
##### Returns
